name: ChemistryVoxel
description: Describes the chemistry discretised into voxels.

dimensions.name: nz
dimensions.description: Number of cells along z, set to 1 in 2D.

dimensions.name: ncoords
dimensions.description: Number of coordinates or spatial dimensions. Should be 3D.

dimensions.name: ncellvecs
dimensions.description: Number of cell vectors describing the simulation cell.  Should equal ncoords.

properties.name: voxel
properties.description: Three (two for 2D) vectors defining a voxel.

properties.name: elements
properties.description: Chemical symbol of each chemical element.  By convension the dependent element (e.g. Al) is listed first.

properties.name: X
properties.description: Average composition of each voxel.  The sum over elements should equal one.

properties.Name: phase
properties.description: The fraction of each phase in the voxels.

properties.Name: atvol
properties.description: Average volume per atom for each phase.
